products.productdescription: A pretty, delicate shade of cream, the spectrum in peach white has a subtle hint of, you guessed it, peach hue. The dainty colour of this blind does little to betray the strength and durability of the materials used, with its heavy gauge aluminium slats that will never sag. The peach white will harmonise beautifully with true colour peaches and apricots, to create a wonderfully sophisticated and unusual colour scheme in a living room or bedroom. Partner these fruity shades with off-whites and barely-there creams, and you'll have a colour scheme that is good enough to eat.

products.title: Spectrum, Gloss White - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, gloss white - venetian blind the shiny gloss finish of the spectrum's gloss white shows off the quality of its heavy gauge aluminium slats, and comes with matching rails as well as pull-cords, which allow you to control the light coming into the
products.productdescription: The shiny gloss finish of the spectrum's gloss white shows off the quality of its heavy gauge aluminium slats, and comes with matching rails as well as pull-cords, which allow you to control the light coming into the room with ease. For a sheen to match the finish of a high quality suite, use in the bathroom amongst white floor and wall tiling. Then use a bold accent colour, such as cerise or orange, to add a pop of colour, which you can change at will.

products.title: Spectrum, White China - Venetian Blind

products.productdescription: A soft, off-white, with a subtle satin finish, the spectrum in white china is pretty and discreet in appearance, yet strong and durable in functionality, due to its heavy gauge aluminium slats, and high quality fittings in the form of matching pull-cords and rails. Integrate the white china into a calming pastel colour palette in your home office, where you can combine a cool aesthetic with workable practicality. Any shade will look beautiful against this soft hue, but we particularly love pretty mint greens and barely-there blues.

products.title: Ecowood, Absolute White Satin - Venetian Blind

products.productdescription: Silky smooth, as its name suggests, the ecowood in absolute white satin has a beautifully untextured finish and the icy white is clean and refreshing. Wide slats form the main structure of this blind, easily adjustable for light, air, and privacy versatility.Enhance the pure, fresh white of the absolute white satin and pit it against an equally clean-toned mint green for a calming yet energising ambience in the kitchen.
